activities: BambooHR provides software for small and medium-sized businesses to manage their human resources employee information. BambooHR’ ensure a fail-safe transition for company employee data to travel from spreadsheets to our flexible Human Resource Information System (HRIS) that adapts to a company’s changing needs. BambooHR stores information for the entire employee lifecycle—from applicants to employee and BambooHR even retains information for employees after they no longer work at that company for a specified period of time. BambooHR serves tens of thousands of employees in 70 countries worldwide. We store information of current and former employees, consultants, contractors and job applicants for processing and storage.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
